00001 <?php
00002 require_once(dirname(__FILE__).'/IReader.php');
00003 class StringReader implements IReader {
00004     private $position;
00005     private $string;
00006     public function StringReader($string) {
00007         $this->string = $string;
00008         $this->position = 0;
00009     }
00010     public function Read($characters) {
00011         if($characters > 0) {
00012             if($this->position+$characters > strlen($this->string)) {
00013                 return false;
00014             }
00015             $str = substr($this->string,$this->position,$characters);
00016             
00017             $this->position += $characters;
00018             return $str;
00019         }
00020         return "";
00021     }
00022     public function ReadCString() {
00023         $string = '';
00024         while(($char = $this->Read(1)) !== false) {
00025             $string.=$char;
00026             if($char == "\0") {
00027                 break;
00028             }           
00029         }
00030         return substr($string,0,-1);
00031     }
00032     public function Seek($position) {
00033         $this->position = $position;
00034     }
00035     public function Skip($count) {
00036         $this->position += $count;
00037     }
00038     public function ReadInt($characters) {
00039         return BytesToIntLilEnd($this->Read($characters));
00040     }
00041     public function GetPosition() {
00042         return $this->position;
00043     }
00044     public function GetSubString($start,$length = FALSE) {
00045         if($length == FALSE) {
00046             $length = strlen($this->string)-$start;
00047         }
00048         $str = substr($this->string,$start,$length);         
00049         return $str;
00050     }
00051 }
00052 
00053 function BytesToIntLilEnd($string) { //little endian
00054     if($string == "") {
00055         return false;
00056     }
00057     $length = strlen($string);
00058     $int = 0;
00059     for($i=0;$i<$length;$i++) {
00060         $int += ord($string{$i})<<($i*8);
00061     }
00062     return $int;
00063 }
